tweets.text: TREE & HEDGEROW REMOVAL STARTS 4th MAY. The problem is the scale & extent of habitat removal here: https://t.co/SdJh7fiEqd I know the site and there‚Äôs a lot! This should be a brilliant restoration project. Now a disaster! Appalling bad practice & agreed by @EnvAgency @NESouthWest https://t.co/mXD9wgJ1ZR

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

It is. It is astonishing. But it is and @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice know it. So does @StaffordshireCC @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids Thank You @DJAndyMoor for your support and voice @StinkStopthe https://t.co/cikerfAUTU

@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC And why does it still stink ?  And why won‚Äôt you stop them poisoning us ?
Solutions please

Removing this kind of habitat during bird nesting season is appalling practice, and trying to placate us all with the ruse that ecologists will wade through thick brambles to find and protect active nests is insulting. They won‚Äôt. @kiergroup @EnvAgency https://t.co/ekGmPRyEmW

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K
Crazy that this is / has been allowed to happen https://t.co/JSWqx5fXiA

Pro Fox hunting PCC candidates are in place countrywide, they will allow Fox hunting to continue to slip under the radar.
Please check that you‚Äôre not unwittingly voting for this cruel pastime on Thursday. https://t.co/krxhuKh6NR

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

@ClareDinnisEA @robbiedyson @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @StaffordshireCC @NewsNBC You promised an update from the deadline and weekend inspections, has this been issued yet please? I am 2 miles away and yet again experienced ghastly odours and bad breathing air over the weekend resulting in my wife having a 24 hr debilitating migraine. Will this ever end?
@ChrisGPackham @AlexiaRFishwick @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Insane!! It‚Äôs May!! Illegal & totally stupid.

I‚Äôm not an environmental lawyer but how can the Environment Agency lawfully sanction what is on its face a crime? And if it won‚Äôt stop a gross contravention of the WCA then what is its purpose, its raison d‚Äô√™tre? @GeorgeMonbiot @EnvAgency https://t.co/y6ucGwFrFZ
@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Down in Cardiff the labour government gave permission to rip up a hedgerow bustling with  birds and nests üò°

I wonder if we will get a comment before work starts from one of the lead project partners as shown on the LORP website?https://t.co/QmOqIv3ULS @ClintonDevon @EnvAgency @PebblebedHeaths https://t.co/NsYmoFJkdP
